personal_info.summary: With over 3 years of experience as a Mobile App Developer, I led the development of Fast Cloud, achieving a 40% optimization between kitchen and service. My experience in different sectors has helped me develop adaptability to various needs, teams, and work methodologies, understanding requirements and optimizing their implementation.

responsibilities: Implemented new user flows, optimizing navigation and user experience in apps.
Analyzed and developed customized requirements, ensuring each functionality adapted to business needs.
Managed and published updates on Google Play and App Store, using CI/CD to automate deployments and reduce production errors.
Collaborated with the support team to resolve bug tickets and user-reported issues, ensuring a smooth app experience.
Worked with Designers and Product Managers to transform ideas into functional and attractive UIs.
Developed and implemented custom mobile applications for different sectors, including transportation, insurance, and automotive, covering both frontend (App) and backend sides.
Led the development of a restaurant management app, optimizing order flow, tickets, and kitchen processes in real-time.
Developed REST APIs to enable communication between apps and backend services, ensuring performance and security.
Managed and published updates on Google Play and App Store, ensuring successful deployments and stable versions for users.
Implemented an Integrated Deployment and Continuous Deployment system, improving the development team's efficiency by 30%.
Conducted training on Version Control System management, increasing developer productivity by up to 30%.
Designed and developed an app for pedestrian and vehicle access control, reducing identification time by 50% and improving security.
Implemented a document verification app for staff, optimizing access and availability of key documents.
Built and deployed robust and scalable backends for applications, ensuring efficient integration with existing systems.
Managed and published updates on Google Play and App Store, ensuring successful deployments and stable versions.
Assisted in developing a mobile application, collaborating on the implementation of new functionalities.
Worked on integrating components and UI/UX improvements to optimize user experience.
Participated in brainstorming sessions to define technological solutions within the team.
